title: 5) Constructions required for ingress and egress of passengers using Public Mass Transit Facilities shall be permitted on any land reserved/existing amenity for any public purpose irrespective of its permissibility given in any land use classification
clause_text: 5) Constructions required for ingress and egress of passengers using Public Mass Transit Facilities shall be permitted on any land reserved/existing amenity for any public purpose irrespective of its permissibility given in any land use classification.
section: For plot having reservation area less than 1000 sq. m
